guide.defaultMessage:
I am your personal intelligent assistant {{appName}}. How can I assist you today?
If you need a more professional or customized assistant, you can click to create a custom assistant.
guide.defaultMessageWithoutCreate: I am your personal intelligent assistant {{appName}}. How can I assist you today?
guide.groupMessage: Welcome to Group Chat! Collaborate with multiple AI agents in a shared conversation space.

qa.q05: How do I deploy and use {{appName}}?
qa.q08: Is there a cloud service version available?
qa.q09: Does it support local language models?
qa.q10: Does it support image recognition and generation?
qa.q11: Does it support speech synthesis and speech recognition?
qa.q12: Does it support a plugin system?
qa.q13: Is there a marketplace to acquire GPTs?
qa.q14: Does it support multiple AI service providers?
qa.q15: What should I do if I encounter issues while using it?

a01.title: Brain Storm
a01.description: Collaborative idea generation and creative problem solving with multiple perspectives
a01.prompt: Let's start a brainstorming session for our project. Can you help us generate creative ideas and solutions?

a02.title: Werewolf Game
a02.description: Social deduction game where players use strategy and discussion to find the werewolves
a02.prompt: Let's play a werewolf game! Can you help us set up the rules and facilitate this social deduction game?

a03.title: Mock UN
a03.description: Simulate United Nations debates and diplomatic negotiations on global issues
a03.prompt: Let's simulate a United Nations debate. Can you help us set up a diplomatic negotiation on a global issue?

a04.title: Design Review
a04.description: Collaborative feedback session for design concepts, prototypes, or creative work
a04.prompt: We need to review some design work. Can you help us provide constructive feedback on our design concepts and prototypes?

a05.title: Code Review
a05.description: Technical discussion and peer review of code changes and implementations
a05.prompt: Let's review some code together. Can you help us analyze this code and identify areas for improvement?

a06.title: Planning Poker
a06.description: Agile estimation technique using cards to estimate project tasks and effort
a06.prompt: We're doing planning poker for our project. Can you help us estimate the effort for these tasks using agile techniques?

a07.title: Debate Club
a07.description: Structured discussion and argumentation on various topics and current events
a07.prompt: Let's have a structured debate. Can you help us organize a discussion on this topic with proper argumentation?

a08.title: Study Group
a08.description: Collaborative learning session to discuss concepts and solve problems together
a08.prompt: Let's form a study group. Can you help us understand these concepts and solve problems together?

a09.title: Book Club
a09.description: Literary discussion and analysis of books, stories, and written works
a09.prompt: Let's start a book club discussion. Can you help us analyze this book and explore its themes together?

a10.title: Game Night
a10.description: Fun interactive games and activities to build team bonds and have fun
a10.prompt: It's game night! Can you help us organize some fun interactive games to build team bonds?

a11.title: Movie Club
a11.description: Watch and discuss films, documentaries, and visual media together
a11.prompt: Let's start a movie club discussion. Can you help us analyze this film and explore its themes together?

a12.title: Language Practice
a12.description: Practice speaking and learning new languages with native speakers
a12.prompt: Let's practice a new language together. Can you help us learn and practice speaking this language?

a13.title: Cooking Class
a13.description: Learn and share cooking techniques, recipes, and culinary traditions
a13.prompt: Let's have a cooking class! Can you help us learn new recipes and cooking techniques together?

a14.title: Tech Talk
a14.description: Discuss emerging technologies, innovations, and industry trends
a14.prompt: Let's have a tech talk! Can you help us discuss emerging technologies and industry trends?

a15.title: Music Jam
a15.description: Collaborative music creation, sharing, and appreciation sessions
a15.prompt: Let's have a music jam session! Can you help us create and appreciate music together?

a16.title: Investment Club
a16.description: Analyze markets, discuss investment strategies, and share financial insights
a16.prompt: Let's analyze the markets together. Can you help us discuss investment strategies and share financial insights?

a17.title: Fitness Challenge
a17.description: Set group fitness goals, share workouts, and motivate each other
a17.prompt: Let's start a fitness challenge! Can you help us set goals and motivate each other to stay fit?

a18.title: Travel Planning
a18.description: Plan trips, share travel experiences, and discover new destinations
a18.prompt: Let's plan a trip together! Can you help us research destinations and plan our travel itinerary?

a19.title: Art Workshop
a19.description: Create, critique, and appreciate various forms of visual and digital art
a19.prompt: Let's have an art workshop! Can you help us create, critique, and appreciate various forms of art?

a20.title: Science Fair
a20.description: Explore scientific concepts, conduct experiments, and share discoveries
a20.prompt: Let's explore science together! Can you help us conduct experiments and share our discoveries?

pickAgent: Or choose from the following assistant templates

slogan.desc1: Pioneering the new age of thinking and creating. Built for you, the Super Individual.
slogan.desc2: Create your first assistant and let's get started~
slogan.title: Unlock the superpower of your brain
